creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: tie-dyed dark blue ground; 12 horizontal bands sewn together; decorated with light blue concentric diamonds and shadowy light blue diamonds; fringe on short ends
dimension: 46 3/4 x 49 3/4 in. (118.75 x 126.37 cm) (irregular, without fringe)
markings: \'Bought in/Doubafla/8/99 10.000\', in blue ink, on tag tied to fringe; \'La Eagua/direso [crossed out] 5./gouporo\', in blue ink, on back of tag
title: Woman's wrapper
